section.title: Install Designate with PowerDNS
section.p: Designate Service defaults to the PowerDNS Backend if another backend is not configured for domain name service. PowerDNS will be deployed to one or more control planes clusters, based on the placement of the powerdns service component.

section.title: Configure the Backend
section.p:
Ensure the Designate components, and the PowerDNS component have been placed on a cluster. PowerDNS may be placed on a separate cluster to the other Designate components. control-planes: - name: control-plane-1 region-name: region1
clusters: - name: cluster1 service-components: - lifecycle-manager - mysql - ip-cluster - apache2 - ... - designate-api - designate-central - designate-pool-manager - designate-zone-manager - designate-mdns - designate-client - powerdns
